titleInfo.title: A biographic theory of fertility and empirical findings from a German biographical survey: paper prepared for the 12th World Congress of Sociology, Research Committee "Sociology of Population - Comparative Social Demographic Perspectives of the Life Course"

bibliographicCitation.default:
Birg H (1990)
Presented at the 12th World Congress of Sociology, Madrid, Spain.
